info.title: ConfidentialLedger
info.description: Microsoft Azure Confidential Compute Ledger Managed CCF Control Plane REST API version 2025-06-10-preview.

get.description: List the operations for the provider

post.description: To check whether a resource name is available.

get.description: Retrieves the properties of all Confidential Ledgers.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the list operation. eg. $filter=ledgerType eq 'Public'

get.description: Retrieves the properties of all Managed CCF.

parameters.description: The filter to apply on the list operation. eg. $filter=ledgerType eq 'Public'

put.description: Creates a  Confidential Ledger with the specified ledger parameters.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.name: confidentialLedger
parameters.description: Confidential Ledger request body for Updating Ledger

201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result.

AADBasedSecurityPrincipal.description: AAD based security principal with associated Ledger RoleName

principalId.description: UUID/GUID based Principal Id of the Security Principal

tenantId.description: UUID/GUID based Tenant Id of the Security Principal

ledgerRoleName.description: LedgerRole associated with the Security Principal of Ledger

ApplicationType.description: Object representing the application type of the Confidential Ledger. Defaults to ConfidentialLedger.

CertBasedSecurityPrincipal.description: Cert based security principal with Ledger RoleName

cert.description: Public key of the user cert (.pem or .cer)

ledgerRoleName.description: LedgerRole associated with the Security Principal of Ledger

ConfidentialLedger.description: Confidential Ledger. Contains the properties of Confidential Ledger Resource.

ConfidentialLedgerBackup.description: Object representing Backup properties of a Confidential Ledger Resource.

restoreRegion.description: The region where the backup of the ledger will eventually be restored to.

uri.description: SAS URI used to access the backup Fileshare.

ConfidentialLedgerBackupResponse.description: Object representing the backup response of a Confidential Ledger Resource.

message.description: Response body stating if the ledger is being backed up.

ConfidentialLedgerList.description: Object that includes an array of Confidential Ledgers and a possible link for next set.

value.description: The ConfidentialLedger items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ConfidentialLedgerRestore.description: Object representing Restore properties of a Confidential Ledger Resource.

fileShareName.description: Fileshare where the ledger backup is stored.

restoreRegion.description: The region the ledger is being restored to.

uri.description: SAS URI used to access the backup fileshare.

ConfidentialLedgerRestoreResponse.description: Object representing the restore response of a Confidential Ledger Resource.

message.description: Response body stating if the ledger is being restored.

DeploymentType.description: Object representing DeploymentType for Managed CCF.

languageRuntime.description: Unique name for the Managed CCF.

EnclavePlatform.description: Object representing the enclave platform for the Confidential Ledger application. Defaults to IntelSgx.

LanguageRuntime.description: Object representing LanguageRuntime for Manged CCF.

ledgerName.description: Unique name for the Confidential Ledger.

aadBasedSecurityPrincipals.description: Array of all AAD based Security Principals.

certBasedSecurityPrincipals.description: Array of all cert based Security Principals.

hostLevel.description: CCF Property for the logging level for the untrusted host: Trace, Debug, Info, Fail, Fatal.

maxBodySizeInMb.description: CCF Property for the maximum size of the http request body: 1MB, 5MB, 10MB.

subjectName.description: CCF Property for the subject name to include in the node certificate. Default: CN=CCF Node.

nodeCount.description: Number of CCF nodes in the ACC Ledger.

writeLBAddressPrefix.description: Prefix for the write load balancer. Example: write

workerThreads.description: Number of additional threads processing incoming client requests in the enclave (modify with care!)

enclavePlatform.description: Enclave platform of the Confidential Ledger.

applicationType.description: Application type of the Confidential Ledger.

scittConfiguration.description: The SCITT Configuration that needs to be set for the Confidential Ledger.

LedgerRoleName.description: LedgerRole associated with the Security Principal of Ledger

LedgerSku.description: SKU associated with the ledger resource

LedgerType.description: Type of the ledger. Private means transaction data is encrypted.

ManagedCCF.description: Managed CCF. Contains the properties of Managed CCF Resource.

ManagedCCFBackup.description: Object representing Backup properties of a Managed CCF Resource.

restoreRegion.description: The region where the backup of the managed CCF resource will eventually be restored to.

uri.description: SAS URI used to access the backup Fileshare.

ManagedCCFBackupResponse.description: Object representing the backup response of a Managed CCF Resource.

message.description: Response body stating if the managed CCF resource is being backed up.

ManagedCCFList.description: Object that includes an array of Managed CCF and a possible link for next set.

value.description: The ManagedCCF items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

appName.description: Unique name for the Managed CCF.

appUri.description: Endpoint for calling Managed CCF Service.

memberIdentityCertificates.description: List of member identity certificates for  Managed CCF

runningState.description: Object representing RunningState for Managed CCF.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of Managed CCF Resource

nodeCount.description: Number of CCF nodes in the Managed CCF.

ManagedCCFRestore.description: Object representing Restore properties of Managed CCF Resource.

fileShareName.description: Fileshare where the managed CCF resource backup is stored.

restoreRegion.description: The region the managed CCF resource is being restored to.

uri.description: SAS URI used to access the backup Fileshare.

ManagedCCFRestoreResponse.description: Object representing the restore response of a Managed CCF Resource.

message.description: Response body stating if the managed CCF resource is being restored.

MemberIdentityCertificate.description: Object representing MemberIdentityCertificate for Managed CCF.

ProvisioningState.description: Object representing ProvisioningState for Confidential Ledger.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation is data action or not.

ResourceProviderOperationDisplay.description: Describes the properties of the Operation.

operation.description: Name of the resource provider operation.

description.description: Description of the resource provider operation.

ResourceProviderOperationList.description: List containing this Resource Provider's available operations.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results, if any.

RunningState.description: Object representing RunningState for Confidential Ledger.
